short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Save your favorite fonts so you never forget they exist.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: How many times did you forget that a certain font you found on the internet existed? Fonts Jar is a Chrome extension that allows you to save your favorite fonts from an always growing list of supported websites. The fonts you add to your favorites list will always be at your fingertips in the extension popup, where you can remove them, group them in collections, filter them and search them.
